import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { BackEndServiceService } from 'src/app/back-end-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registercomplaint', templateUrl: './registercomplaint.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registercomplaint.component.scss'] }) export class RegistercomplaintComponent implements OnInit { Dataarray:any[]=[]; constructor(private backendservice:BackEndServiceService, private route:ActivatedRoute){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.backendservice.getproductdata().subscribe((res) => { this.Dataarray = res; }); // this.sub = this.route.paramMap.subscribe((params)=>{ // this.id = params.get('id'); // this.backendservice.Deleteproduct(this.id).subscribe(data =>{}) // }); } }
